description: Defines FastAPI routes for managing Jira project data, including endpoints for retrieving user projects and project details, with dependency injection, logging, and error handling.

methods.name: get_projects( jira_service: JiraService = Depends(get_jira_service), current_user: dict = Depends(require_authentication) )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve all Jira projects accessible to the authenticated user.

methods.name: get_project_details( project_key: str, jira_service: JiraService = Depends(get_jira_service), current_user: dict = Depends(require_authentication) )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve detailed information of a specific Jira project by project key.

ctags.name: get_project_details
ctags.signature: ( project_key: str, jira_service: JiraService = Depends(get_jira_service), current_user: dict = Depends(require_authentication) )

ctags.name: get_projects
ctags.signature: ( jira_service: JiraService = Depends(get_jira_service), current_user: dict = Depends(require_authentication) )
